The following statement contains a magic number: using (var sr = new StreamReader ("dict2.txt")) {  	string lesson = "";  	string data = "";  	while ((data = sr.ReadLine ()) != null) {  		if (string.IsNullOrEmpty (data) || data.StartsWith ("---")) {  			continue;  		}  		var regex = Regex.Match (data' @"第(?<lesson>\d+)课");  		if (regex.Success) {  			lesson = regex.Groups ["lesson"].Value;  			//sb.AppendLine(lesson + " " + data);  		}  		else {  			if (Regex.IsMatch (data' @"\S+〔\S+〕")) {  				data = data.Replace ("〔"' " 〔");  			}  			if (Regex.IsMatch (data' @"〔\S+〕\S+")) {  				data = data.Replace ("〕"' "〕 ");  			}  			var arr = data.Split (' ');  			var temp = new List<string> ();  			arr.ToList ().ForEach (x =>  {  				if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty (x)) {  					temp.Add (x);  				}  			});  			arr = temp.ToArray ();  			if (arr.Length == 1) {  				sb.AppendLine (lesson + " " + arr [0] + " a a a");  				continue;  			}  			var kanji = arr [0];  			var haragana = arr [1];  			if (Regex.IsMatch (haragana' @"〔\S+〕"))//第2位是类型，如えっ〔叹〕 啊  			 {  				temp.Insert (1' " a ");  				arr = temp.ToArray ();  				sb.AppendLine (lesson + " " + Trim (arr));  			}  			else if (arr.Length == 2 && !Regex.IsMatch (arr [1]' @"〔\S+〕"))//日文+中文  			 {  				sb.AppendLine (lesson + " " + kanji + " a a " + haragana);  			}  			else if (arr.Length == 3 && !Regex.IsMatch (arr [2]' @"〔\S+〕"))//第3位不是类型，如たいへんですね 大変ですね 真不容易，够受的，不得了  			 {  				sb.AppendLine (lesson + " " + kanji + " " + haragana + " a " + arr [2]);  			}  			else if (arr.Length > 4) {  				sb.AppendLine (lesson + " " + Trim (arr));  			}  			else {  				sb.AppendLine (lesson + " " + data);  			}  		}  	}  }
